html: Ephraim—Of the ten tribes, frequently called by the name of Ephraim. Of enemies they shall be made friends. The adversaries—Not the body of Ephraim, for they are supposed to be reconciled, and they shall not be cut off, but live in love with Judah, as we see by the next clause; but those few of them who continue in their enmity together with all the rest of their adversaries.
